create_cultivation.ponder.cultivation.te: The Cultivation Base needs to be used with a Cultivation Tank. Place the Cultivation Base below the Cultivation Tank and supply it with Stress to start working.
Right-click the Cultivation Tank with a plantable item to plant it inside. Right-click with an empty hand to retrieve the seed.
The Cultivation Machine will automatically tend to and harvest crops. If the harvest contains a plantable item, the machine will automatically replant it.
A Spout can be used to water it, which will increase the yield.
Harvested items are stored in the base and can be extracted with a Funnel or Chute.
You can continue to stack Cultivation Tanks to increase the height; some plants require a certain height to grow and be harvested.
You can import custom cultivation recipes using data packs.
